<answer>The search results provided two documents related to team building activities:

1. "team-building-activities.docx" - This document outlines a series of team-building activities aimed at enhancing team cohesion, communication, and overall productivity. It includes four specific activities:
   - Problem-Solving Workshop
   - Outdoor Team Challenge
   - Team Lunch and Learn
   - Creative Workshop

2. "tips-for-team-building-activities.docx" - This document provides general tips for team building activities, including defining clear objectives, encouraging participation, fostering communication, and providing feedback.

Both documents seem relevant to team building activities, but they serve different purposes. The first document appears to be a specific plan for team-building activities within the company, while the second document offers more general advice on how to approach team building.</answer>
